metadata.synopsis: VB played on the first time the players reach the Moonshield on the Haven bridge. They comment on how it holding back the shodows.
metadata.how_to_trigger: go to 3, 29, 110 in SCL_Main_A and then enter the moonshield half way across the birdge.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: No shadows here - something must be keeping it at bay.
